Key Match Events: Anthony Davis recorded a triple-double with 36 points, 16 rebounds, and 3 blocked shots
Los Angeles ended up with fastbreak layups fresh off Minnesota made buckets
Minnesota shot just 41 percent from the field and 31 percent from deep
Minnesota committed 16 giveaways that led to 19 points for the Lakers
Pre-Game Insights: There were concerns about the Timberwolves heading into the season
Chris Finch acknowledged that the team needed to simplify their game plan early on
Finch mentioned that the team lacked urgency and resistance in defense early in the game
Post-Match Reflections: Finch stated that the team needs to find another level of urgency
Finch suggested that the poor start was not indicative of the team's potential for the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Timberwolves trailed by 19 in the first half
Anthony Edwards scored 27 points but required 25 shots to do so
Jaden McDaniels was limited to just 16 minutes of action as he battled foul trouble
Mike Conley had no impact in his 20 minutes of play
